roleset.name: to lower in quality or character, break down a compound
roleset.note: DEGRADE-V NOTES: Based on ECTB2. Member of VNcls other_cos-45.4 (from degrade.01-v)
DEGRADATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with degrade.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from degradation.01-n)

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: Tencel, made * from wood cellulose, has given the lie to the notion that man-made fibers never degrade, and is set * to become one of the most import fibers of the coming environmental century.

example.name: With Agent
example.text: He felt they were degrading him by making him report to a supervisor.
example.arg: by making him report to a supervisor

example.name: All Arguments partially made-up
example.text: You have degraded what should have been serious lectures with yourpersonal opinions.
example.arg: what should have been serious lectures

example.text: Alzheimer's degradation of Mr.Jones's memory saddened his family and friends.
